name: Infiltrator (itch) (JasonLab)
description:
This is a local multiplayer game in which you must speak to each other in order to find out who is the infiltrator. The game is heavily based on spyfall, and requires being with the people who play it, like a board game.

PS: Android port is HIGHLY experimental, and may not work on many devices.

PPS: Game does not support disconnections yet.
